Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class is responsible for managing the player's actions and status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname)
      Initialize the player
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • assignStartingCard

      public void assignStartingCard(NonObjectiveCard initialCard)
      Initializes the player hand and places the initial card in the player's hand
      Parameters:
      initialCard - is the initial card assigned by the match
      Throws:
      NonEmptyHandException - Hand was not empty when we tried to assign the starting card

    • initializeGameField

      public void initializeGameField(boolean isUp)
      Create the field and place the initial card in it
      Parameters:
      isUp - denote the side of the card chosen by the player
      Throws:
      NonNullFieldException - Field existed already (was not null)
      NullHandException - Hand was null when tried to assign the starting card

    • secretObjectiveSelection

      public void secretObjectiveSelection(int id) throws InvalidSelectionException
      Search in the player hand for the card that has to be selected and saved as the secret objective
      Parameters:
      id - of the card chosen by the player
      Throws:
      InvalidSelectionException - Tried to choose a non-valid secret objective card

    • receiveSecretObjective

      public void receiveSecretObjective(Card firstCard, Card secondCard)
      Place the two card given in the parameters in the hand so that that one of them can be chosen as secret objective
      Parameters:
      firstCard - is the first choice for the secret objective
      secondCard - is the second choice for the secret objective
      Throws:
      SecretObjectiveCardException - Tried to receive secret objective when already received

    • putCardInHand

      public void putCardInHand(NonObjectiveCard newCard)
      tries to put a card in the hand of the player
      Parameters:
      newCard - is the card that has to be added to the hand of the player
      Throws:
      NullHandException - Tried to add a card to a null hand
      InvalidHandSizeException - Hand size was somehow greater than 3

    • performMove

      public void performMove(int id, int x, int y, boolean isUp) throws InvalidSelectionException, MissingRequirementsException, InvalidPositionException
      Tries to take a card from the hand of the player and place it in the field. If the card is placed successfully calculate the points gained from its placement and add them to those of the player
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the card in the hand of the player that has to be placed
      x - is the horizontal coordinate of the position
      y - is the vertical coordinate of the position
      isUp - is the side of the card that is going to be visible when placed
      Throws:
      InvalidSelectionException - Tried to place a card that was not in the player's hand
      MissingRequirementsException - Tried to place a card in a position that was not empty
      InvalidPositionException - Tried to place a card in a position that was not valid
      NullFieldException - Tried to place a card in a null field

    • updatePointsForObjectives

      public void updatePointsForObjectives(Card[] objectiveCards) throws AlreadyComputedPointsException
      Use the given cards to calculate the extra points that the player gains from the common objectives and add them to the current personal points
      Parameters:
      objectiveCards - are the common objectives used to calculate the extra points
      Throws:
      NullPointStrategyException - Found a card with a null PointStrategy
      AlreadyComputedPointsException - Tried to calculate points when they were already calculated

    • updatePointsForSecretObjective

      public void updatePointsForSecretObjective() throws AlreadyComputedPointsException
      Calculate the points gained by the player for the secret objective and add them to his current points
      Throws:
      NullPointStrategyException - Found a card with a null PointStrategy
      AlreadyComputedPointsException - Tried to calculate points when they were already calculated

    • rollbackMove

      public void rollbackMove() throws RollbackException
      This method is used to roll back the last move performed by the player. It restores the game field and the player's points to their previous state.
      Throws:
      RollbackException - if the game field is null, indicating that no move has been made yet.

    • availableSpacesPlayer

      public ArrayList<int[]> availableSpacesPlayer()
      Calculates and returns a list of all available spaces in the player's field upon which a card can be freely played
      Returns:
      ArrayList of couples of integers denoting the x and y coordinates of the available position in the player's field

      public String getNickname()
      Getter:
      Returns:
      the nickname of the player

      public Field getField()
      Getter:
      Returns:
      the field if initialized, null if not

    • getSecretObjective

      public Card getSecretObjective()
      Getter:
      Returns:
      a Card if the secretObjective has already been selected, null if not

      Returns:

      Returns:

      Getter:
      Returns:
      the hand of the player

    • getInitialCard

      public NonObjectiveCard getInitialCard()
      Find the initial card, if assigned, and returns it
      Returns:
      The initial Card, if it was non already assigned returns null

    • getTmpSecretObj

      public Card[] getTmpSecretObj()
      Getter:
      Returns:
      the objective cards received by player.

    • getPointsGainedFromObjectives

      public int getPointsGainedFromObjectives()
      Getter:
      Returns:
      the points gained from the objectives

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints(int points)
      Setter
      Parameters:
      points - is the value to be set as number of points of the player

    • setColour

      public void setColour(Colour colour)
      Assign a colour to the player if it doesn't have already one
      Parameters:
      colour - is the colour of the player
      Throws:
      NonNullColourException - Try to set the colour when it was already set.
